column2: so the restaurant was still fairly empty as they had just opened. All of us had our carry-on luggage. We asked for a table for 6
column3: and they took a minute to seat us. The staff decided to seat us upstairs- keep in mind there were clear tables on the ground level- so we all had to carry our bags up to their second floor. Our table wasn't yet ready
column4: so we waited near another table that was set up for 7
column5: and asked if it would be ok if we sat there. The waitress said no
column6: and explained that the table was set up for 9
column7: despite only seeing 7 place settings... and proceeded to seat us at a table in the far back
column9: and next to a large group on a food tour.
